epics.Description: Portable principal-backed identity and delegated authority chain for autonomous execution.
Deterministic policy and risk decisioning as the only authority to mint spend authorizations.

epics.Summary: Program C: Execution Intent + Contract Plane
epics.Description: Canonical intent and machine contracts for quote/auth/execute/settle/reverse cycles.
Autonomous policy-aware tool/provider discovery and deterministic negotiation state machines.
Outcome-derived reputation and risk-priced capital primitives (credit/insurance).

epics.Summary: Program F: Compliance + Legal + Physical Adapters
epics.Description: Jurisdiction-aware policy packs and adapter bridges for real-world rails and attestations.

tickets.Summary: Add AgentPassport.v1 protocol object and schema
tickets.Description: Formalize principal-backed agent identity envelope with delegation root, key anchors, and policy envelope hints.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Spec + schema merged; examples validate; object hash/signing rules documented with strict null/optional semantics.

tickets.Description: Resolve effective authority from root->leaf grants with depth, expiry, and revocation checks.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Deterministic lineage resolution for same snapshot; explicit failure codes for revoked/expired/depth violations.

tickets.Summary: Bind delegation refs into decision/receipt artifacts
tickets.Description: Persist delegation root/effective grant refs so historical accountability survives runtime drift.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Decision + receipt bindings include stable delegation refs and pass offline verification replay.

tickets.Summary: Add ExecutionIntent.v1 protocol object and schema
tickets.Description: Create canonical pre-execution intent with request fingerprint, risk profile, spend bounds, and policy binding.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Spec + schema merged; intent hash rules are deterministic and test vectors exist for canonicalization edge cases.

tickets.Summary: Implement policy compiler and deterministic decision hash
tickets.Description: Compile policy packs into executable constraints and emit deterministic decision fingerprints.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Identical policy+intent input emits byte-equivalent decision records and stable evaluation hashes.

tickets.Summary: Gate authorize-payment on issuer decision for all wallet-bound flows
tickets.Description: Enforce issuer as sole mint authority and reject bypass paths.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: All wallet-bound authorize paths fail without valid decision token; replay semantics remain idempotent.

tickets.Description: Standardize obligations, milestones, settlement terms, and dispute venue for agent work contracts.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Work contract schema supports milestone payment and dispute linkage without ambiguous state transitions.

tickets.Description: Add append-only milestone transitions with deterministic settle/reverse semantics.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Milestone transitions are replay-safe; duplicate submissions do not double-settle.

tickets.Summary: Require strict request binding for side-effect contracts
tickets.Description: Enforce request fingerprint matching for action/financial class contract calls.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Mutated request replay is rejected with stable code; read/compute backward compatibility remains intact.

tickets.Description: Add policy-aware `resolve` API for tool/provider selection by intent, budget, and risk constraints.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Resolver excludes uncertified/incompatible options by default and returns deterministic ranked results.

tickets.Description: Allow agent runtimes to call Nooterra resolver directly through MCP surfaces.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: MCP tool returns machine-usable ranked options with trust bindings and policy compatibility flags.

tickets.Summary: Implement negotiation thread protocol and API
tickets.Description: Add offer/counter/accept/abort deterministic thread state machine.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Thread replay reproduces final state exactly; invalid transitions return stable reject codes.

tickets.Summary: Compute reputation deltas from verified outcomes only
tickets.Description: Build reputation pipeline from receipt/outcome proofs; exclude unverifiable signals.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: All reputation events contain source receipt ids; no mutation occurs without verifiable evidence chain.

tickets.Description: Issue bounded credit lines based on policy + verified reliability metrics.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Credit decisions are reproducible and include machine-readable rationale bindings to input evidence snapshots.

tickets.Description: Add claim intake/decision path bound to outcome and contract evidence.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Claim decisions are append-only, explainable, and bound to contract+receipt references.

tickets.Summary: Define compliance decision protocol and policy packs
tickets.Description: Add jurisdiction-aware compliance decision object and policy pack schema.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Compliance decisions are deterministic, exportable, and include rule-level explainability fields.

tickets.Description: Add pluggable oracle adapter with quorum policy for real-world completion signals.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Oracle disagreement follows deterministic quorum/fail-closed outcomes and is receipt-event traceable.

tickets.Summary: Add physical rail adapters as certified tool contracts
tickets.Description: Model payout/procurement/card flows as certified provider adapters instead of bespoke runtime paths.
tickets.Acceptance Criteria: Each adapter passes conformance and produces standard receipt/decision/reversal evidence with no privileged bypass channels.
